Key Match Events: Dani Olmo scored in the 51st minute.
Mikel Merino scored the winning goal in the 119th minute of extra time.
Florian Wirtz scored Germany's equalizer in the 89th minute.
Niclas Füllkrug had a header saved by a post in the 120th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: This match was presented as the best teams at the tournament taking a look in the mirror.
Luis de la Fuente and Julian Nagelsmann both emphasized similarities between their teams.
Post-Match Reflections: Unai Simón made a crucial save in the 120th minute to prevent a penalty.
Toni Kroos announced that this was his last kick in his career.
Spain's Luis de la Fuente will need to count his men back and work out how they won.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game featured 41 shots and 16 yellow cards.
There were 18 fouls committed during the match.
